block_comment: This block of code is devoted to toggle the enable signal ("refresh_cmd_en") for the refresh command based on certain conditions. At the rising edge of the clock, if the fifth bit of the reset input signal is set, it deactivates the "refresh_cmd_en" after a delay defined by "TCQ". However, if the counter "refresh_timer" hits a value of 1023, the block activates the "refresh_cmd_en". Lastly, if both 'cmd_clk_en' and 'refresh_cmd_en' are active simultaneously, it deems the refresh command complete, hence resets 'refresh_cmd_en' after a delay defined by "TCQ". The enable signal "refresh_cmd_en" controls the execution of memory-refresh operations to prevent data loss.
